title: (x) Font similar to Bookman swash... / bold serif for Kings of Leon t-shirt - Cabernet, Emfatick {Akira, Nick Curtis}
content:
Hi there,

Can someone please help to identify this font?

It is similar to bookman swash, but on closer inspection it is not the same.

Help appreciated.

Thanks

Trent

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831182913im_/http:/typophile.com/files/big_full_3642.jpg)
author: NZTrent

comments.content:
Or, you could try this one...

[http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/emfatick-nf/regular/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831182913/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/emfatick-nf/regular/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/emfatick-nf/regular/")

and save about a hundred dollars...
